name: AVVideoCodecType
desc: A set of constants that describe the codecs the system supports for video capture.

items.name: static let hevcWithAlpha: AVVideoCodecType
items.desc: The HEVC video codec that supports an alpha channel.

items.name: static let proRes422LT: AVVideoCodecType
items.desc: The Apple ProRes 422 LT video codec.

items.name: static let proRes422HQ: AVVideoCodecType
items.desc: The Apple ProRes 422 HQ video codec.

items.name: static let proRes422Proxy: AVVideoCodecType
items.desc: The Apple ProRes 422 Proxy video codec.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a codec type from its raw string value.
